io.sentry.spring.tracing

Class SentryTracingConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sentry.spring.tracing.SentryTracingConfiguration

  • @Configuration
public class SentryTracingConfiguration
extends Object
    Provides infrastructure beans for creating transactions and spans around bean methods annotated with SentryTransaction and SentrySpan.

      • sentrySpanPointcut

        @Bean
 @NotNull
public @NotNull Pointcut sentrySpanPointcut()
        Pointcut around which spans are created.

        This bean is can be replaced with user defined pointcut by specifying a Pointcut bean with name "sentrySpanPointcut".

        Returns:
        pointcut used by SentrySpanAdvice.

                                                          @NotNull Pointcut sentrySpanPointcut)
